title: Christmas Gift Guide 2018: Gifts for dads | Trusted Reviews
description:

Dads are notoriously difficult to by for - there are only so many times you
can give him an identical pack of handkerchiefs before Christmas starts to
feel a lot like Groundhog Day.

We’ve pulled together a few ideas to suit a whole range of dads – and a whole
range of budgets.

## Gift under £20 for dads

### [Scotland Yard **£16.96**](https://www.amazon.co.uk/Ravensburger-Scotland-
Yard-Hunt-Mr/dp/B00LGWRTS2/ref=as_sl_pc_as_ss_li_til?tag=tr-
giftguides-2018-21&linkCode=w00&linkId=514dbfdc5c1ca7eabde497e116599b65&creativeASIN=B00LGWRTS2)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://www.amazon.co.uk/Ravensburger-Scotland-
Yard-Hunt-Mr/dp/B00LGWRTS2/ref=as_sl_pc_as_ss_li_til?tag=tr-
giftguides-2018-21&linkCode=w00&linkId=514dbfdc5c1ca7eabde497e116599b65&creativeASIN=B00LGWRTS2)

For something slightly – but not entirely – out of left field, a classic board
game is a great option. Not just a gift for a gifts sake, it gives the family
something fun and relaxing to do while you let that Christmas dinner digest.
Scotland Yard may not have the name recognition of your Monopolys or your
Cluedos, but that just makes it an even better gift, giving it a more
surprising edge. The gameplay sees one player take on the role of villain,
while the others try to hunt them down. Clear enough to play with kids and
inventive enough to be satisfying for adults, with a classic murder mystery
setup that is entertaining for all, this one is a true all-rounder.
